thread.title: Another game, another Grayson Allen controversy
thread.title_full: Another game, another Grayson Allen controversy

author: Molly Podlesny
title: Another game, another Grayson Allen controversy
text:
What else is new?
Grayson Allen is at it again. 
Here, he missed a shot and grabbed the defender’s arm in frustration. In a series of unfortunate stumbles, he ended up over by Wake Forest’s bench, and things got ... scuffle-y. 
He earned a technical foul for this little spat. Just last week, things were heating up between Allen and NC State’s bench .
This is about where we’re at with him right now.
Grayson Allen is now causing incidents due to everyone assuming that Grayson Allen is about to cause an incident.
— John Gasaway (@JohnGasaway) January 28, 2017
